definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 8:5 perh. orig. n. pr. div., then gen. image, statue (Ph. [[סמל]] id., f. [[סמלת]], Lzb:151, 329, also [[פנסמלת]] Id:329; Bau:Rel. i. 88 understands ´[[ס]] to be design. of foreign god);—abs. ´[[הַסּ]] 2Ch 33:7, 2Ch 33:15, [[סָָמֶל]] De 4:16; cstr. [[סֵ֫מֶל]] Ez Eze 8:3, Eze 8:5; —image, figure of anything, ´[[פֶּסֶל תְּמוּנַת כָּל־ס]] De 4:16; idol-image ´[[פֶּסֶל הַסּ]] 2Ch 33:7 and ([[פֶּסֶל]] om.) v:2Ch 33:15; [[סֵמֶל הַקִּנְאָה]] Ez Eze 8:3 the statue of jealousy, i.e. that rouses ´[[י]]'s jealousy, = v:Eze 8:5.
